reviewText: love the show and need it to get me closer to completing the series. I have enjoyed it very much
i really enjoyed this anime good fighting romance comedy adventure this anime has it all i really enjoyed it thank you
This anime is good, the only problem I had with it was that it drags on and on, but overall I would watch it again.

Kurogane and Shaoran have been fighting demons and training in their spare time. The top ranked demon is said to possess a feather that gives it the power to defeat any hunter that comes after it, as well as control other demons. The truth behind the strange world is revealed and you will be shocked by the truth.
funny at good times, and love the martial arts and sword fights shown. this series has great music and most all the characters english voices suit them great and bring them life.
This is a good Clamp anime.  It ties in with xxxholic and keeps you on the edge. Worth a watch for those who love the Clamp style.
